attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to see if my wonderful president could give me some advice on how to cure covid-19🤡😡 and the strangest thing happened! once the app finished downloading, bleach started pouring out of my walls and flooding my house! it was okay though because i inhaled a lot of bleach and i was suddenly NOT SICK ANYMORE! our president is truly a medical hero❤️ thank you trump for your insightful research! TRUMP 2020🇺🇸 in a graveyard✨🧚‍♀️🌈💫💓🌟
attributes.title: 2 inch croissant energy

attributes.review: terrible app!! when i downloaded i was first shown a blank screen, when i restarted it there was simply a live stream of freshwater monk toads eating hot cheetos??? WHAT? i came to support MY president. not his family of toads. i cannot access any other app besides my toad-cheeto feed. i’ve had to buy a new phone AND my younger grand daughter who had a similar experience . YOU LOST MY VOTE CHEETO TOAD MAN! 0/10. get this virus off the app store.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: The minute I download this app, anyone who was near me began yelling racist and misogynistic remarks. My tv automatically began playing racist news channels and my right, as a female, to chose what happens to my own body was stripped away from me. IT WAS TERRIFYING!!! Do not download!!! I wish I could give it ZERO stars, but even that is disrespectful to the incredible character, Zero, from the novel and movie Holes. So I would give it -1 stars.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: It took a YEAR to download❗️ DONT DOWNLOAD ITT. Last time I used it was today and my day got worser and worser!😭 the notifications I got were so digusting I had to delete!! It said all lives matter😠😠 I am disappointed but I don’t expect much from a LOW QUALITY APP!! My day got worser from that as I opened the app, it asked for my phone number!!!!!! I don’t trust an animal with my phone number chile😤😰😰
attributes.title: I’m disappointed 👎🏻

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it would be HUGE and AMAZING 👐🏼 but no this is the WORST apps on the App Store. I would know because I’m the BEST app reviewer in the world and I’m always #1 at everything I do... ummm. Deleting this app would be the BIGGEST thing in all of history. Remember to MAKE the APPSTORE GREAT AGAIN and delete this corrupt and sleepy failure of an app. Do us all a failure and FIRE this app because I’ve always known it was a failure
attributes.title: the #1 WORST app

attributes.review: The App is honestly terrible, people of colour have been placed into a situation where our lives are in danger, especially to the Black Community. The simple fact that an Orange can further contribute to so much hate by not seeing us, is honestly sad. In addition to this, the Orange has no intent to care for human lives as this app that the Orange is present in promotes the spread of COVID-19, which is utterly ridiculous. Shame on the Orange.
attributes.title: This App is Racist

attributes.review: horrible app, made my grandmother fly though my ceiling, it took me by surprise cause we barbies her days before, my dogs started telling “FOREIGNER” at the top of his lungs, my trump supporter dad got a bucket of paint and dumped it on himself yelling offensive slurs and something about a ‘pizza gate’? then my mom started floating, she took out our dog while mom screamed “GRAB HER” and my dog said “BY THE” and then both screamed “P*SSY” over and over, don’t recommend!!
attributes.title: terrible app!

attributes.review: I promise you this app is horrible and is a waste of space in your phone. I’ve noticed a lot of battery loss on my Xbox when I downloaded this app and my bananas started walked. I downloaded this app to see our glorious president Ronald trump and this app honestly doesn’t show his stupidity enough. Please delete this app ASAP
